item.title: Iranian Kamikaze Drone â€” Shahed 136
item.description: Iranian Kamikaze drone has a price tag of fewer than twenty-five thousand dollars, which is half the average price of a car in the US and roughly one percent of the Tomahawk price tag. It appears to be a low-cost cruise missile that can be effective when fired in groups. How does it work? How can it be destroyed?
